text: wadhkr -ayha alnby- hin qal 'iibrahim daeyana: rbb ajeal "mk" bldana amnana min alkhwf, warzuq 'ahlah min 'anwae althmrat, wkhuss bhdha alrizq man aman minhum biallah walyawm alakhr. qal allh: waman kafar minhum farzqh fi aldunya w'umteh mtaeana qalilana thuma 'uljyuh mrghmana 'iilaa eadhab alnar. wabis almrje walmqam hdha almsyr
